name: A City Tower Builder: Stack Them Up!
name_original: A City Tower Builder: Stack Them Up!
description:
Are you looking for an awesomely fun game that's addictive and challenging? This game offers the simplicity of the exciting games of the past combined with bright colors and amazing graphics.

Think you have the skills to make it to the top? The object of the game is to stack as high as you can! It might sound simple, but to master it you must possess creativity and some critical problem-solving skills!

Use your finger to tap the screen when you're ready to release the tower. Just make sure you really are ready because it's all in strategy and timing!

You'll love the amazing graphics, fun sound effects, and quick pace. City Tower Builder is Game Center enabled, too, making it even easier to share your scores and test your skills against others. So get ready to stack 'em high and work your way to the top!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
